review: Absolutely loved it. It's always a pleasure to see such gem among all the junk that Bollywood produces every year. Highly recommend for someone who is looking for a motivational story grounded in reality.
The acting, the storyline, the climax, it all feels so natural and heartwarming. Motivating to the core, friendship at the best. Not the best movie I'd say, but a really good one. A must watch!
